verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5319>showed<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5085>Tiberias;<s%> and on <S%G3779>this<s%> wise <S%G5319>showed<s%> he himself.

There were <S%G3674>together<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> and <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> of <S%G2580>Cana<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and the sons of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, I <S%G5217>go<s%> a <S%G232>fishing.<s%> They <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, We <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>go<s%> with you. They <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G305>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2117>immediately;<s%> and that <S%G3571>night<s%> they <S%G4084>caught<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

But when the <S%G4405>morning<s%> was <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G123>shore:<s%> but the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> not that it was <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3813>Children,<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> you <S%G3387>any<s%> meat? <S%G4371><s%> They <S%G611>answered<s%> him, <S%G3756>No.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G906>Cast<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G3313>side<s%> of the <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and you shall find. <S%G2147><s%> They <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G3765>now<s%> they were not <S%G2480>able<s%> to <S%G1670>draw<s%> it for the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G2486>fishes.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> that <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> It is the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G3767>Now<s%> when <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that it was the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> he <S%G1241>girt<s%> his <S%G1903>fisher's<s%> <S%G1903>coat<s%> to him, (for he was <S%G1131>naked,<s%>) and did <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> in a <S%G4142>little<s%> <S%G4142>ship;<s%> (for they were not <S%G3112>far<s%> from <S%G1093>land,<s%> but as it were <S%G1250>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4083>cubits,<s%>) <S%G4951>dragging<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> with <S%G2486>fishes.<s%>

As soon <S%G3767>then<s%> as they were <S%G576>come<s%> to <S%G1093>land,<s%> they <S%G991>saw<s%> a fire of <S%G439>coals<s%> there, and <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G1945>laid<s%> <S%G1945>thereon,<s%> and <S%G740>bread.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5342>Bring<s%> of the <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3568>now<s%> caught. <S%G4084><s%>

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up, and <S%G1670>drew<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> to <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2486>fishes,<s%> an <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and <S%G4004>fifty<s%> and <S%G5140>three:<s%> and for all there were <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>many,<s%> yet was not the <S%G1350>net<s%> <S%G4977>broken.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Come <S%G1205><s%> and dine. <S%G709><s%> And <S%G3762>none<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G5111>dared<s%> <S%G1833>ask<s%> him, <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> you? <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that it was the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> and <S%G2983>takes<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G1325>gives<s%> them, and <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G3668>likewise.<s%>

<S%G5124>This<s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> time that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5319>showed<s%> himself to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> after that he was <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G709>dined,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of <S%G2495>Jonas,<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> you me <S%G4119>more<s%> than these? <S%G5130><s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> that I <S%G5368>love<s%> you. He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1006>Feed<s%> my lambs. <S%G721><s%>

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> time, Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of <S%G2495>Jonas,<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> you me? He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> that I <S%G5368>love<s%> you. He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4165>Feed<s%> my sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him the <S%G5154>third<s%> time, Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of <S%G2495>Jonas,<s%> <S%G5368>love<s%> you me? <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G3076>grieved<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him the <S%G5154>third<s%> time, <S%G5368>Love<s%> you me? And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things; you <S%G1097>know<s%> that I <S%G5368>love<s%> you. <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1006>Feed<s%> my sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

<S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3753>When<s%> you <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3501>young,<s%> you <S%G2224>gird<s%> <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> and <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> you <S%G2309>would:<s%> but <S%G3752>when<s%> you shall be <S%G1095>old,<s%> you shall <S%G1614>stretch<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> your <S%G5495>hands,<s%> and <S%G243>another<s%> shall <S%G2224>gird<s%> you, and carry <S%G5342><s%> you <S%G3699>where<s%> you <S%G2309>would<s%> not.

<S%G5124>This<s%> <S%G2036>spoke<s%> he, <S%G4591>signifying<s%> by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> he should <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> And when he had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>Follow<s%> me.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G1994>turning<s%> <S%G1994>about,<s%> <S%G991>sees<s%> the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G190>following;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G377>leaned<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G4738>breast<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1173>supper,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> is he that <S%G3860>betrays<s%> you?
<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> him <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> shall <S%G3778>this<s%> man do?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> that he <S%G3306>tarry<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is that to you? <S%G190>follow<s%> you me.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> <S%G1831>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that that <S%G3101>disciple<s%> should not <S%G599>die:<s%> <S%G2532>yet<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> not to him, He shall not <S%G599>die;<s%> but, <S%G1437>If<s%> I will that he tarry <S%G2193>till<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is that to you?

<S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3140>testifies<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> things, and <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things: and we <S%G1492>know<s%> that his <S%G3141>testimony<s%> is <S%G227>true.<s%>

And there are <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> things <S%G3745>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> the <S%G3748>which,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they should be <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> I <S%G3633>suppose<s%> that <S%G3761>even<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> could not <S%G5562>contain<s%> the <S%G975>books<s%> that should be <S%G1125>written.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
